token embeddings.from sentence: The token embeddings were pre-trained on a large corpus combining Wikipedia , PubMed , and PMC texts ( Moen and Ananiadou , 2013 ) using the word2vec tool 4 ( denoted as " Word2vec- wiki+P.M. " ) .

learning rate.from sentence: The learning rate is initially set as 0.003 and decayed by 0.9 after each epoch .

CNN encoder.from sentence: The window sizes of the CNN encoder in the sentence encoding layer are 2 , 3 , 4 and 5 .

fixed during.from sentence: They are fixed during the training phase to avoid over-fitting .

trained using.from sentence: The model is trained using the Adam optimization method ( Kingma and Ba , 2014 ) .

regularization.from sentence: For regularization , dropout ( Srivastava et al. , 2014 ) is applied to each layer .

dropout.from sentence: To reduce this gap , we adopted the dropout with expectation - linear regularization introduced by to explicitly control the inference gap and thus improve the generaliza - tion performance .
